session_summary: Deborah told Jolene about the canceled yoga getaway due to a storm at 7:39 pm on September 8, 2023. They discussed balancing busy schedules, self-care activities like yoga, and planned a coffee date at a cafe for next Wednesday at 4. Deborah suggested a hidden coffee shop near her for a future meeting. Jolene had to reschedule the coffee date to Friday at 5 due to prior plans and Deborah agreed, expressing excitement for the meet-up. They wished each other to stay safe and look forward to the upcoming coffee date.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Hey Jolene, had a tough week. Storm forced us to cancel our yoga getaway.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Sorry to hear about it. How are you feeling now?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: I was bummed about it, but I'm doing better now. It was just a setback, but I found comfort in my work and spending time at home. Reminds me to be grateful for the little things. And you? How's it going?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: My partner and I plan a camping trip to connect with nature and practice yoga.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: It can be both good and tough to plan activities with a busy schedule - what strategies do you use?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Having a routine helps me stay on top of everything I need to do. I have a schedule for classes, studying, and personal time. Self-care activities like yoga and meditation help me stay balanced and relax.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: I'd love to learn more about how you do it.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I can tell you about it if you're interested. It took a bit of experimenting, but it's really helped me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Sounds great! Let's set up a coffee date and talk about it!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a coffee shop with a bunch of coffee machines
conversation_turns.text: Wanna meet up at that cafe next Monday? Let's try fresh pastries.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Sounds good, Jolene! When did you have in mind? That cafe rocks.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person holding a cup of coffee in front of a bunch of flowers
conversation_turns.query: coffee cozy coffee shop holding cup of coffee
conversation_turns.text: How about Wednesday at 4? Can't wait to catch up over coffee!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a group of people sitting at tables in a room
conversation_turns.text: That pic looks so peaceful. Reminded me of a cool hidden coffee shop near me. Rate it!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Tell me more about it when we meet, maybe next time weâ€™ll be there.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Sorry, I remembered that I already have plans for this day.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Now I'll see when it's more convenient for me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Thank you for your understanding, I'm waiting.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a room with a book shelf and a ceiling fan
conversation_turns.text: How about Friday at 5? I will need to sort out the books from this bookcase and I will be free.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Absolutely, let's do that! Can't wait for our coffee date next week. See you then. Stay safe!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: See ya soon, Deb! Be safe and I'm excited for our coffee date!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Maybe just grab me some interesting books!

Deborah: Deborah has to cancel the yoga retreat she was planning with her friends because of a storm
